Class SchemeReader

  |

public class SchemeReader
extends Reader

Provides hooks so you can define Java Readers in Skij.

Constructor Detail

SchemeReader

public SchemeReader(Procedure r,                    Procedure c)
Create a SchemeReader.
Parameters:
r - A Scheme procedure to return characters. The procedure takes 3 arguments: an array to store the characters in, a starting position, and a count. The procedure should retun the number of chars actually read.
c - A Scheme procedure of no arguments to handle EOF conditions.
See Also:
Reader.read()
